name: Erigon
about: Erigon is an implementation of Ethereum (execution client), on the efficiency frontier. Archive Node by default.
question_1: Erigon has a fast and compact data model, pushing the boundaries of archive node performance. More innovations are coming: check out https://twitter.com/ErigonEth
question_2: The Ethereum Foundation and Gnosis DAO, among others, have been supporting Erigon.
